input_text:
Job Title: Embedded Systems Engineer

Location: Pella, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

Are you a system thinker who uses your curiosity and ingenuity to identify customer needs, apply industry requirements and understanding of multiple technologies to innovate and optimize complex control systems? In this role you will identify stakeholder needs, derive requirements, conduct tradeoff analysis, develop algorithms and functional architectures, review product design, verify and trouble shoot systems. We are looking for a leader to work across a range of engineering disciplines to create unique solutions while having a focus on delivery and quality.

location: PELLA, Iowa

job type: Permanent

salary: $90,000 - 108,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

 Assist with gathering customer needs and lead translating these into detailed control system requirements. Lead the definition, analysis and allocation of requirements across the various engineering areas. Develop the high-level system architecture and perform trade-off analysis for design approaches. Plan machine-level system integration and testing approaches and procedures both virtually and physically. Provide technical leadership for a small to medium complex cross functional development projects.

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 4 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors (required)

Skills

Embedded

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad Digital, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad Digital offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
